pr_title: This prevents the io.quarkus artifacts being installed.

timeline.author: gastaldi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -99,6 +99,9 @@ jobs:
         with:
           name: maven-repo
           path: maven-repo.tgz
+      - name: Delete Local Artifacts From Cache
+        shell: bash
+        run: rm -r .m2/repository/io/quarkus

replies.bodyText: Ah, the command is already run in ~, ignore me
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: Nope, I think I was right, the build failed for this reason :)
replies.author: gastaldi

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if this shouldn't run before the Cache Maven Repository action 🤔
timeline.author: gastaldi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -99,6 +99,9 @@ jobs:
         with:
           name: maven-repo
           path: maven-repo.tgz
+      - name: Delete Local Artifacts From Cache

replies.bodyText:
No, it needs to run after it.
The cache action is kinda odd, as it adds a step at the end to actually save the result. Basically the initial step restores the cache if it exists, and the 'post' step after the build saves the result.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas

timeline.message:
This prevents the io.quarkus artifacts being installed.

Remove io.quarkus artifacts before the cache is uploaded

This prevents the io.quarkus artifacts being installed.

Remove io.quarkus artifacts before the cache is uploaded
